prompt: Photojournalistic shot of a busy commuter road at dawn with a hazy skyline; smog and tail-lights suggesting multiple sources of greenhouse gas emissions (transport, industry, power plants) without logos; natural grey light; 35mm, f/5.6, ISO 400, 1/250s; neutral tone, no sensationalism.

Photojournalistic scene of a mixed meeting table (government, business, civil society) reviewing emissions charts on a screen; identifiable logos and faces avoided, focus on hands, notes and the graph; office fluorescent lighting; 35mm, f/4, ISO 1000; neutral tone.
Documentary photo of a coastal walkway partially flooded during high tide with sandbags and warning tape; pedestrians navigating shallow water; overcast daylight; 35mm, f/8, ISO 320; neutral tone.
Photojournalistic image of workers installing solar panels on a warehouse roof; safety vests and tools visible, no brand logos; broken clouds and soft daylight; 28mm, f/8, ISO 200; neutral tone.
Telephoto documentary shot of refinery stacks and gas flares at dusk emitting plumes; silhouettes against orange sky; 135mm, f/8, ISO 200; neutral tone, no brand marks.
Documentary photo of a recently cleared patch at the edge of a tropical forest with stacked logs; soil disturbance evident; soft morning light; 35mm, f/8, ISO 400; neutral tone, no dramatic edits.
Photojournalistic view of a livestock corral and adjacent cropland; methane capture signs absent; farmers doing routine tasks; daylight, gentle contrast; 35mm, f/5.6, ISO 400; neutral tone.
Documentary photo of an industrial district with factory buildings and delivery trucks; mild haze, functional look; 50mm, f/8, ISO 200; neutral tone, no brand logos.

Photojournalistic interior of a corporate conference room where bar charts of emissions and sustainability targets are on screen; anonymous silhouettes; office lighting; 35mm, f/4, ISO 800; neutral tone.
Documentary photo of a government press room with a lectern and policy charts about climate targets on a backdrop; no identifiable emblems; 50mm, f/5.6, ISO 800; neutral tone.

Photojournalistic image of a financial trading floor with screens showing investment portfolios including green energy indexes; focus on hands at keyboards, charts on screens; 35mm, f/4, ISO 1600; neutral tone, no logos.
Documentary photo of a large shopping street with illuminated shop windows and crowds carrying multiple bags; evening light, wet pavement reflections; 35mm, f/4, ISO 1000; neutral tone.
Photojournalistic scene of emergency workers securing a street after a severe storm: fallen branches, water on the asphalt, warning cones; overcast light; 28mm, f/5.6, ISO 800; neutral tone.
Documentary coastline photo with king tide covering parts of a promenade, benches partially submerged; long, flat horizon; 28mm, f/8, ISO 200; neutral tone.
Photojournalistic image of a dry riverbed bordering a fragmented woodland; informational signs about protected area; afternoon side light; 35mm, f/8, ISO 400; neutral tone.

Photojournalistic shot inside a community water distribution point: several people filling containers, a health poster in background; daylight through doorway; 35mm, f/4, ISO 1000; neutral tone, faces not primary subject.
Documentary photo of a transit depot with multiple electric buses charging under a canopy of chargers; overcast daylight; 28mm, f/8, ISO 400; neutral tone.

Photojournalistic image of a small peaceful climate demonstration in a public square; handmade signs about emissions reduction; inclusive crowd, no recognizable faces; 28mm, f/5.6, ISO 800; neutral tone.
Documentary lab scene: researchers calibrating instruments that measure atmospheric samples; lab benches, glassware; white balanced indoor light; 35mm, f/4, ISO 1600; neutral tone.
Photojournalistic shot of a city hall briefing room where a policy presentation on climate adaptation is projected; audience taking notes; 35mm, f/4, ISO 1600; neutral tone, no emblems.

Fotografía de una carretera de entrada a ciudad al amanecer con horizonte brumoso; luces traseras y ligera neblina sugieren múltiples fuentes de emisiones (transporte, industria, energía) sin logotipos; luz gris natural; 35mm, f/5.6, ISO 400, 1/250s; tono neutral, sin sensacionalismo.

Escena fotoperiodística de una mesa de reunión mixta (gobierno, empresas y sociedad civil) revisando gráficos de emisiones en una pantalla; sin logos ni rostros identificables, foco en manos, notas y el gráfico; iluminación de oficina; 35mm, f/4, ISO 1000; tono neutral.
Foto documental de un paseo costero parcialmente inundado en marea alta con sacos de arena y cinta de advertencia; peatones sorteando agua somera; luz nublada; 35mm, f/8, ISO 320; tono neutral.
Imagen fotoperiodística de técnicos instalando paneles solares en el tejado de una nave; chalecos y herramientas visibles, sin marcas; nubes rotas y luz suave; 28mm, f/8, ISO 200; tono neutral.
Toma documental con teleobjetivo de antorchas y chimeneas de refinería al atardecer emitiendo penachos; siluetas sobre cielo naranja; 135mm, f/8, ISO 200; tono neutral, sin marcas.
Foto documental del borde de un bosque tropical con un claro reciente y troncos apilados; suelo removido; luz suave de mañana; 35mm, f/8, ISO 400; tono neutral sin dramatismo.
Vista fotoperiodística de un corral de ganado junto a tierras de cultivo; tareas rutinarias de granja; luz diurna de contraste suave; 35mm, f/5.6, ISO 400; tono neutral.
Foto documental de un polígono industrial con naves, chimeneas y camiones de reparto; ligera neblina; 50mm, f/8, ISO 200; tono neutral, sin logotipos.

Foto documental de costa con marea viva cubriendo parte del paseo; bancos parcialmente sumergidos; horizonte plano; 28mm, f/8, ISO 200; tono neutral.
